name: Technical Support
description: Issues related to product functionality or technical glitches.

name: Billing Inquiry
description: Questions or disputes about invoices, payments, or subscriptions.

name: Account Management
description: Requests for password resets, profile updates, or account closures.

name: Product Feature Request
description: Suggestions or requests for new features or improvements.

name: General Inquiry
description: General questions not fitting other categories.
